_meta.note: Curated external inputs (values + 1σ uncertainties + context). Keep this small and auditable.

alpha_inv_mZ.scheme: effective EM coupling at mZ (scheme-dependent; commonly quoted)

mH_GeV.scheme: chosen benchmark scale for strict strong target

delta_alpha_lept_mZ2.scheme: leptonic vacuum polarization contribution at mZ^2 (approx)

delta_alpha_had5_mZ2.scheme: hadronic vacuum polarization (5 flavors) at mZ^2 (approx)

delta_alpha_top_mZ2.scheme: top vacuum polarization contribution at mZ^2 (approx)

sin2thetaW_mZ_MSbar.scheme: MSbar weak mixing angle at mZ (commonly quoted; scheme-dependent)

sin2thetaW_on_shell.scheme: on-shell weak mixing angle (pole-mass definition); sin^2(thetaW)=1-mW^2/mZ^2

tgt_sin2thetaW(Qweak).scheme: sin2thetaW_eff: PV ep (Qweak final); inferred from Q_W^p at Q^2=0.0248 GeV^2 (space-like), using SM radiative corrections
tgt_sin2thetaW(Qweak).citation: Qweak Collaboration (Androic et al.), Nature 557, 207 (2018) (proton weak charge Q_W^p=0.0719±0.0045; DOI:10.1038/s41586-018-0096-0)

tgt_sin2thetaW(E158).scheme: sin2thetaW_eff: PV Møller (E158); quoted at Q^2=0.026 GeV^2 (space-like)

tgt_sin2thetaW(nue_lowE).scheme: sin2thetaW_eff: low-energy nu-e scattering global fit (reactor+accelerator); MeV-scale; single-Q approximation
tgt_sin2thetaW(nue_lowE).citation: arXiv:1608.02671 ("The weak mixing angle from low energy neutrino measurements: a global update")

tgt_sin2thetaW(CHARMII).scheme: sin2thetaW_eff: nu_mu-e scattering (CHARM II); sin^2Theta_{nu e} from differential cross-section ratio; representative Q^2~0.01 GeV^2 (Q~0.1 GeV)
tgt_sin2thetaW(CHARMII).citation: CHARM II Collaboration (P. Vilain et al.), Phys. Lett. B335 (1994) 246-252: sin^2Theta_{nu e}=0.2324+-0.0083

tgt_sin2thetaW(NuTeV).scheme: sin2thetaW_on_shell: NuTeV nu_mu-N DIS extraction of s_W^2 (Paschos-Wolfenstein style); Davidson et al. Eq.(9) quotes: s_W^2=0.2276±0.0013(stat)±0.0006(syst)±0.0006(th) -0.00003(Mt/GeV-175)+0.00032 ln(mh/100 GeV). Here base value 0.2276 corresponds to Mt=175 GeV,mh=100 GeV (mass terms vanish). Stored value applies the quoted mass correction using registry benchmarks mt=172.76 GeV, mH=125.0 GeV: delta=+1.386059364e-4. sigma stored is quadrature-combined from the three ± terms (0.0015524…≈0.0016). Representative DIS scale Q^2~20 GeV^2 (Q~4.47 GeV)
tgt_sin2thetaW(NuTeV).citation: Davidson, Forte, Gambino, Rius, Strumia (CERN-TH/2001-366), hep-ph/0112302 (NuTeV discussion; Eq.(9) quote)

tgt_sin2thetaW(NuTeV_eq10).scheme: sin2thetaW_on_shell: NuTeV alternative extraction from g_L^2,g_R^2 (Davidson et al. Eq.(10)) on the same page as Eq.(9): s_W^2(NuTeV)=0.2272±0.0017±0.0001(top)±0.0002(Higgs). sigma stored is quadrature-combined (0.0017146…≈0.0017). Representative DIS scale Q^2~20 GeV^2 (Q~4.47 GeV)
tgt_sin2thetaW(NuTeV_eq10).citation: Davidson, Forte, Gambino, Rius, Strumia (CERN-TH/2001-366), hep-ph/0112302 (NuTeV discussion; Eq.(10) quote)

tgt_sin2thetaW(CsAPV).scheme: sin2thetaW_eff: Cs-133 atomic parity violation (APV); E→0 effective limit; scheme of Ref. [31] in Porsev et al.

tgt_sin2thetaW(CsAPV_PDG).scheme: sin2thetaW_eff: Cs atomic parity violation (APV) interpreted as a low-energy weak mixing angle point; PDG quote at 2.4 MeV
tgt_sin2thetaW(CsAPV_PDG).citation: PDG RPP 2025 (Standard Model review, rpp2025-rev-standard-model.pdf): s_hat^2(2.4 MeV)=0.2349+/-0.0018 (Cs APV)

tgt_sin2thetaW(eDIS).scheme: sin2thetaW_eff: polarized electron-deuteron DIS (eDIS; SLAC E122 + JLab Hall A); PDG quote; representative DIS#1 scale Q^2≈1.085 GeV^2
tgt_sin2thetaW(eDIS).citation: PDG RPP 2025 (Standard Model review, rpp2025-rev-standard-model.pdf): s_hat_Z^2=0.2299+/-0.0043 (eDIS)

tgt_sin2thetaW(LEP_SLC_Zpole).scheme: sin2thetaW_eff_lept: Z-pole effective leptonic weak mixing angle sin^2θ_eff^lept = 1/4 (1 - v_l/a_l), from LEP+SLC Z-resonance observables; incorporates full EW radiative corrections; Q≈mZ
tgt_sin2thetaW(LEP_SLC_Zpole).citation: ALEPH+DELPHI+L3+OPAL+SLD + LEP EWWG + SLD EWWG, hep-ex/0509008 (updated 2006), Phys. Rept. 427 (2006) 257-454, doi:10.1016/j.physrep.2005.12.006: sin^2θ_eff^lept=0.23153±0.00016

tgt_sin2thetaW(Tevatron_Zpole).scheme: sin2thetaW_eff_lept: Tevatron Run II (CDF+D0) Drell–Yan forward-backward asymmetry extraction of sin^2θ_eff^lept at the Z pole; incorporates SM radiative corrections; Q≈mZ
tgt_sin2thetaW(Tevatron_Zpole).citation: Tevatron Run II combination of sin^2θ_eff^lept from CDF+D0 Drell–Yan A_FB, sin^2θ_eff^lept=0.23148±0.00033 (combined 9–10 fb^-1 per experiment; 2001–2011)
